name: Fortune's Folly
description: The island of Fortune's Folly is well-known to Lady Luck and her crew. A frequent waystation (more of a "hitching post", was how Bosun Markus described it) of convenience for corsairs looking to lay low within the dangerous cover of its rainstorms and fog banks, the ironically named isle has seen far less use of late, ever since another wave of Behemoths arrived to feed on newly exposed archonite deposits.

island_events.name: Aether Surge
island_events.description: Aether surges are a common occurrence across the Hunting Grounds, attracting powerful Behemoths and other hostile creatures.

island_events.name: Slice and Dice
island_events.description: Slay powerful Behemoths before they use their sharp claws to wound you.

island_events.name: High Alert
island_events.description: Extremely powerful Behemoths pose an even greater threat to the island's ecosystem. Slay it quickly.

journal_entries.name: Corsair Anchor
journal_entries.description: A heavy anchor displaying the telltale metallic impurities common in frontier smithery, this rusted relic proves that corsairs once sailed these skies. Judging from the condition of the anchor itself, it's been many years since the vessel that dropped it passed this way.
